response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it's a treasure that has been carefully curated and nurtured over time. Given its significance, I believe it deserves to be appreciated by someone who shares its depth and potential. Considering its rarity and the effort put into it, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $15,000. I trust that you will find its value far beyond the monetary figure, making this a worthwhile investment for you. Should you have any questions or require more information about the product, please feel free to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this special item with you.", "product_price": 15000}
